Reviews.Title: Security system
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Nothing great has grainy picture, NO sound, overpriced as the cheap ones do as well.Only takes a 2GB card maximum-not enough to cover 1 night.Made in China with the rest of the junk!Would not buy again.Oh the receiver and the camera are only about 30 ft apart in the house with 2 walls between them and the pic comes and gos.Screen rolls .Heck my wireless internet will reach 100 ft as i have carried my laptop out in the yard to check SO why wont this wireless system reach 30 ft in my house?Piece of junk!!Sure wish there had been other reviews on this before i bought it.I even moved it to 10 ft almost side by side to check it out and it was still really bad.Don't waste your money.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Color CMOS Camera
Motion Detection
Approximately 300 feet LOS
Min Illumination: 0.3 LUX
420 TV lines resolution
Storage Media: SD Card (2GB Max)
Recording Time: Up to 6 hours on a 2GB Card
Camera Weight: 1.0 oz
Camera Size: 1" x 1" x 1"
Receiver Weight: 6.2 oz
Receiver: 3" x 5" x 3/4"
ProductInfo.Name: KJB Security C800 2.4 Wireless Color Camera with DVR Receiver with Transmit  approx. 300 ft and Recording up to 6 Hours
